ability-capsule.name: Ability Capsule

aguav-berry.description: Restores HP if it's low, but may cause confusion.

yache-berry.name: Yache Berry
yache-berry.description: Weakens a supereffective Ice-type attack against the holding PokÃ©mon.

yellow-apricorn.name: Yellow Apricorn
yellow-apricorn.description: A yellow Apricorn. It has an invigorating scent.

yellow-flute.name: Yellow Flute
yellow-flute.description: A toy flute made from yellow glass. A maniac will buy it for a high price.

yellow-nectar.name: Yellow Nectar
yellow-nectar.description: A flower nectar obtained at Melemele Meadow. It changes the form of certain species of PokÃ©mon.

yellow-scarf.name: Yellow Scarf
yellow-scarf.description: Raises holder's Tough aspect in a Contest.

yellow-shard.name: Yellow Shard
yellow-shard.description: A small yellow shard. It appears to be from some sort of implement made long ago.

zap-plate.name: Zap Plate
zap-plate.description: Increases power of Electric-type moves. Changes Arceus' type to Electric.

zoom-lens.name: Zoom Lens
zoom-lens.description: Raises a move's accuracy if the holder moves after its target.
